sentences.en: A black Mercedes screeched to a halt beside the helicopter.
sentences.cn: 一辆黑色的梅赛德斯轿车在直升机旁嘎的一声刹住了。

sentences.en: A moment or two later champagne in an ice-bucket materialized beside them.
sentences.cn: 片刻之后，他们身边出现了一只装着香槟的冰桶。

sentences.en: Bessie, resplendent in royal blue velvet, was hovering beside the table.
sentences.cn: 贝茜身穿华丽的深蓝色天鹅绒衣服，在桌旁徘徊。

sentences.en: Brian didn't like it, but that was beside the point.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩不喜欢它，但那并不重要。

sentences.en: He had shouted down the phone at her, beside himself with anxiety.
sentences.cn: 他焦急万分地对着电话那头的她大喊大叫。

sentences.en: He knelt beside her and caught her hand in both of his.
sentences.cn: 他跪在她的旁边，双手握住她的一只手。

sentences.en: He lay beside her awkwardly, propped on an elbow.
sentences.cn: 他用一只胳膊肘支着身体，别扭地躺在她旁边。

sentences.en: He was sitting on an upright chair beside his bed, reading.
sentences.cn: 他正坐在床前一张直背椅上看书。

sentences.en: I sat down heavily on the ground beside the road.
sentences.cn: 我一屁股坐在路边的地上。

sentences.en: I was standing right beside her at the time.
sentences.cn: 当时我就站在她的旁边。

sentences.en: I went and stood beside him, looking over his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 我走过去站在他身边，从他的肩头望过去。

sentences.en: Marianne was none too pleased to find Simon seated beside her.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安娜发现西蒙坐在自己旁边很不高兴。

sentences.en: On the table beside an empty plate was a pile of books.
sentences.cn: 桌上空盘子的旁边是一堆书。

sentences.en: She slipped her hand into his and fell into step beside him.
sentences.cn: 她轻轻地把手放进他的手心，和他并排而行。

sentences.en: she was &B{beside herself with}anguish.
sentences.cn: 她由于极度悲痛几乎要发狂了。

sentences.en: she was &B{beside herself with}anguish.
sentences.cn: 她由于极度悲痛几乎要发狂了。

sentences.en: The hunter knelt beside the animal carcass and commenced to skin it.
sentences.cn: 猎人跪在动物尸体旁边，开始剥皮。

sentences.en: The room was empty apart from one man seated beside the fire.
sentences.cn: 除了有个男人坐在火炉边，房间里空荡荡的。

sentences.en: the table beside the bed
sentences.cn: 床边的桌子

sentences.en: They were beside themselves with glee.
sentences.cn: 他们欣喜若狂

sentences.en: This year’s sales figures don’t look very good beside last year’s results.
sentences.cn: 今年的销售额和去年相比不是很好。

sentences.en: Wendy came up and sat beside me.
sentences.cn: 温迪走过来，坐在我身边。

phrases.tran_cn: 发狂：处于异常兴奋或激动状态
极度忧虑（或悲伤、愤怒）的；心烦意乱的，几乎发狂的

trans.tran_en: next to or very close to the side of someone or something
next to or very close to the side of someone or something
